title: How Much Can Time-related Features Enhance Time Series Forecasting?
details: C Zeng, Y Tian, G Zheng, Y Gao - arXiv preprint arXiv:2412.01557, 2024
abstract: Recent advancements in long-term time series forecasting (LTSF) have primarily focused on capturing cross-time and cross-variate (channel) dependencies within historical data. However, a critical aspect often overlooked by many existing methods …
